item.title: 情報筋XとNexstarのNewsNationは、トランプとロバート・F・ケネディ・ジュニアのライブ・タウンホールを別々に開催する計画で、バイデン陣営は参加に同意していない（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Sources: X and Nexstar's NewsNation plan to host separate live town halls with Trump and Robert F. Kennedy Jr.; the Biden campaign has not agreed to take part  —  - The Biden campaign has not agreed to take part.  — A spokesperson for the Biden campaign declined to comment.

item.title: OpenAIのIPおよびコンテンツ担当チーフであるトム・ルービン氏は、パブリッシャーとのパートナーシップは、AIのトレーニングが目的ではなく、ツールの利用やニュースの表示が目的であると述べている（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Tom Rubin, OpenAI's chief of IP and content, says publisher partnerships are “largely not” about training AI but instead about use of tools and display of news  —  It is “incumbent” on OpenAI to make sure smaller publishers get the same potential benefits from platforms like ChatGPT …

item.title: ソースとドキュメントTwitch、専門家、ストリーマー、モデレーターで構成され、信頼と安全性の問題について協議していた安全諮問委員会を終了（Hayden Field/CNBC）
item.description:
Hayden Field / CNBC:
Sources and docs: Twitch terminates its Safety Advisory Council, which consisted of experts, streamers and moderators who consulted on trust and safety issues  —  Twitch on Friday will terminate all members of its Safety Advisory Council, according to sources familiar with the situation and documents viewed by CNBC.

item.title: メモWSJのエマ・タッカーEIC、東海岸、中西部、西海岸支局の閉鎖を含む米国ニュースの取材方法の変更を発表（Katie Robertson/@katie_robertson）
item.description:
Katie Robertson / @katie_robertson:
Memo: WSJ EIC Emma Tucker announces changes in how the outlet covers US news, including closing its East Coast, Midwest, and West Coast regional bureaus  —  NEW: WSJ editor Emma Tucker announces changes in how the paper covers US News, including shuttering east coast, Midwest and West Coast regional bureaus [image]

item.title: 情報筋TikTok、米国ユーザー向けレコメンデーション・アルゴリズムのクローンを開発中、ByteDanceから独立したバージョンになるかもしれない（Reuters）。
item.description:
Reuters:
Sources: TikTok is working on a clone of its recommendation algorithm for its US users that may result in a version that operates independently of ByteDance  —  TikTok is working on a clone of its recommendation algorithm for its 170 million U.S. users that may result in a version …

item.title: レポートネルソン・ペルツのトライアン・パートナーズ、委任状争奪戦の失敗でディズニー株から10億ドルを回収。
item.description:
Meg James / Los Angeles Times:
Report: Nelson Peltz' Trian Partners reaped ~$1B from its Disney stock after his unsuccessful proxy fight; Disney heeded some of his calls, cutting 8,000 jobs  —  In the end, veteran investor Nelson Peltz came away with a big win in his battle with the Walt Disney Co.

item.title: Meta、ThreadsでTweetDeckスタイルのカスタマイズ可能なフィードを全世界で展開開始、今月初めに始まったテストに続く（Emma Roth/The Verge）
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
Meta begins rolling out TweetDeck-style customizable feeds on Threads globally, following a test that started earlier this month  —  Threads is widely rolling out a desktop site redesign that lets you customize your homepage with a series of feeds, similar to TweetDeck.

item.title: 情報筋Skydance、Paramountの買収条件を緩和、議決権を持つ株主にも持たない株主にも有利に、Paramountへの資金投入も合意（Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Skydance sweetens its Paramount offer, making it more favorable to both voting and nonvoting shareholders and agreeing to put more money into Paramount  —  Paramount's independent committee of directors is expected to review the new bid soon  —  Skydance Media has submitted …

item.title: ブライアン・ワインスタインがバッド・ロボットの社長兼COOから3アーツ・エンターテインメントの共同CEO兼ライオンズゲートのジョン・フェルトハイマーCEOの上級顧問に就任（Anthony D'Alessandro/Deadline）
item.description:
Anthony D'Alessandro / Deadline:
Brian Weinstein moves from president and COO of Bad Robot to serving as 3 Arts Entertainment co-CEO and senior adviser to Lionsgate CEO Jon Feltheimer  —  Former Bad Robot President and COO, Brian Weinstein, is heading over to Lionsgate in what is a dual role: He'll be the Co-CEO …

item.title: COVID-19以降のピクサーの失策：映画はDisney+で公開され、主要幹部は退社し、軌道を取り戻すために続編に注力するようになった（Thomas Buckley/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Buckley / Bloomberg:
A look at Pixar's missteps since COVID-19: movies were released on Disney+ and key executives departed, leading to a focus on sequels to get back on track  —  After duds and missteps, the famed animation studio sees Inside Out 2 as key to restoring the magic.

item.title: ハアレツのジャーナリストが、イスラエルの治安当局者に脅され、モサド長官がICC検察官を脅迫しようとしていることを報じるのを妨害されたことを明らかにした（Peter Beaumont/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Peter Beaumont / The Guardian:
A Haaretz journalist reveals Israeli security officials threatened him and blocked his reporting about a Mossad chief's efforts to intimidate an ICC prosecutor  —  Haaretz journalist was warned of ‘consequences’ if he reported on attempts by Mossad chief to intimidate ex-prosecutor

item.title: 70以上のエンターテイメント・チャンネルを放送し、100万人以上の加入者を持つバーチャルMVPDのPhiloが、Core層を月額28ドルに値上げし、CoreにAMC+を追加（Daniel Frankel/Next TV）
item.description:
Daniel Frankel / Next TV:
Virtual MVPD Philo, which carries 70+ entertainment channels and has 1M+ subscribers, raises prices for its Core tier to $28 per month, and adds AMC+ to Core  —  Sports-free virtual pay TV service is now streaming 70 channels for $28 a month, but it is tacking on AMC+ for free

item.title: 英銀行家クリスピン・オデイ氏、フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙が2023年6月に掲載したオデイ氏が複数の女性に性的暴行を加えたとの疑惑を名誉毀損で提訴（プレス・ガゼット紙）
item.description:
Press Gazette:
UK banker Crispin Odey sues the Financial Times for libel over its June 2023 publication of allegations that Odey had sexually assaulted multiple women  —  Former City banker Crispin Odey is suing the Financial Times for libel after it published allegations that he had sexually assaulted multiple women.

item.title: リアリティTVは、仕事が少なくなり、予算が逼迫し、経営陣がリスクを取ることが少なくなり、低迷に直面している。
item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
Reality TV is facing a slowdown as jobs become scarce, budgets get crunched, and executives take fewer risks, coming as a surprise to some industry insiders  —  Development and production have been sluggish since the strikes, leaving desperate workers in the lurch: “All of a sudden the faucet just turned off.”
